name: BidgelyEnergySaver
0:
”Alexa, open energy saver”
”What is my projected bill”
”how can i save my energy”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: energy saver
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bidgely Assistant is available 24x7 to answer your queries related to electricity usage and helps you to save energy. Using complex machine learning algorithms, we extract appliance fingerprints and convert data into useful insights. 
Ask about energy usage , projected bills , ways to save energy and much more. We itemise your energy usage to know the consumption of your individual appliances. 

You may ask usage of specific appliance like cooling , heating , laundry etc and also can set your budget amount to get notified when you cross your budget via any subscribed channels.
